TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IReceiveContextSettings

Docs.summary: An interface that enables you to set receive context settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Receive context allows for controlled acknowledgement when using a one-way message channel and non-destructive reads when using a queued channel.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies if receive context is enabled.
Docs.value: if receive context is enabled; otherwise .
Docs.returns: if receive context is enabled; otherwise .

Docs.summary: Gets a value that specifies a connection timeout when used with direct channels and message lock duration when used with queued channels.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!IMPORTANT] > If ValidityDurationexpires for a message, any transaction that may be used for its processing, will be aborted along with the workflow instance if the expiration occurs during the transaction.
